["DescriptionLuxhabitat is proud and excited to present this 7 bedroom mansion in the VIP community of Umm Al Sheif. The new owner of this incredible brand new and fully furnished Umm Al Sheif mansion will have the honor and pride to call this their home. No detail has been spared with the European high quality of construction and finishing materials.
The grand entrance will give you the feeling that you're walking into a 5-star hotel. Seven-metre high ceiling boasting lots of natural light. Welcome your guests to the grand majlis area which has its own private entrance or entertain them in the open kitchen concept. 
Take a swim in your chilled outdoor pool. Get a work out in your own gym and take a jacuzzi and a sauna to relax. The mansion has its own cinema and entertainment area. Take your private lift up to the master bedroom that has a spacious sitting area, a large walk-through wardrobe leading you to your spa-like bathroom. These are just some of the few features this mansion has to offer.
This rare mansion is a must see - must have, book your private tour today."]

Comprising two towers of 44 and 24 storeys, Al Sahab is situated adjacent to Marina Promenade, and offers beachfront tower apartments in one, two, and three bedroom layouts or marina homes of one and three bedrooms, ranging in size from 768 to 3,232 sq ft.
